sentences.english: These charts do not include counts of deserters , those convicted or executed, etc.
sentences.chinese: 这些表格尚不包括逃兵，被宣判及被处决的人，等等。

sentences.english: Deserters must be arrested and punished.
sentences.chinese: 逃兵一定要追捕和惩罚。

sentences.english: Beong lamsters won't be the choice.
sentences.chinese: 逃兵不会是你们的选择。

sentences.english: We leave are a military deserter again, waited for that again love revives.
sentences.chinese: 我们都别再做个逃兵，等待再一次爱情复兴。

sentences.english: Deserters and dissidents would be summarily executed.
sentences.chinese: 逃兵和持不同意见者会被立即处死。

sentences.english: Because of the small dread half after the drop, when a deserter.
sentences.chinese: 因为小丁在读过半年后就自动退学，当了逃兵。

sentences.english: With the roof caving in, there were an increasing number of desertions.
sentences.chinese: 由于大势已去，逃兵的人数日益增多。

sentences.english: Extraoral origin of small-hing state, shortage of the early Ming Dynasty to the north superoxide deserter living Kawamura.
sentences.chinese: 祖籍口外小兴州，明初逃兵荒到北歧河村居住。

sentences.english: Police said the suspect is a deserter.
sentences.chinese: 警方称，犯罪嫌疑人是一名逃兵。

sentences.english: So , you are a deserter as me?
sentences.chinese: 所以说，你和我一样是一个逃兵？

sentences.english: Already a deserter and now added this crime to his belt.
sentences.chinese: 已经是逃兵了，加上犯罪。

sentences.english: We hunted up the deserters in the forest last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期我们在森林中搜寻逃兵。

definition: see 臨陣退縮|临阵退缩[lin2 zhen4 tui4 suo1]
to flee in disorder/defeated and in rout
loose and disorganized soldiers/stragglers/fig. a loner
horse thief/(old) group of horse-mounted bandits
able-bodied man (capable of fighting in a war)
